casebody.data:
NICHOLS, et al., Appellants, v. HARRIS, Respondent. (Common Pleas of New York City and County, General Term. March 8, 1894.) Appeal from special term. Action by James R. Nichols and others against Albert W. Harris.

Argued before DALY, C. J., and PRYOR and GIEGERIOH, JJ.

S. R. Taylor, for appellants. F. F. Vander Veer, for respondent.

No opinion. Order affirmed, with costs.
